body: More details... Given an rst file like this... ``` .. test documentation master file, created by sphinx-quickstart on Sun Apr 7 18:18:27 2019. You can adapt this file completely to your liking, but it should at least contain the root `toctree` directive. Welcome to test's documentation! ================================ .. toctree:: :maxdepth: 2 :caption: Contents: .. ipython:: python def haha(x): return x That was fun. .. ipython:: python class myclass: def __init__(self, x): self.x = x def printme(self): return x x = 1 # This is a comment def haha(x): return x @haha def haha2(x): return x Indices and tables ================== * :ref:`genindex` * :ref:`modindex` * :ref:`search` ``` I think you want this... That rst file crashes in master. However, if you trim this rst as such... ``` .. test documentation master file, created by sphinx-quickstart on Sun Apr 7 18:18:27 2019. You can adapt this file completely to your liking, but it should at least contain the root `toctree` directive. Welcome to test's documentation! ================================ .. toctree:: :maxdepth: 2 :caption: Contents: .. ipython:: python def haha(x): return x That was fun. .. ipython:: python class myclass: def __init__(self, x): self.x = x def printme(self): return x ``` You get this, which is also wrong.
